review: I am marginally adept at computers and their offshoots, but even I--even I--was able to set-up Fire TV in less than five minutes.  Just make sure to have the password for your wireless handy, and all you have to do is plug in two cables.  Insanely easy.As for the content, aside from all the free movies and TV shows, I downloaded YouTube, for starters.  If you have satellite TV, for about $120 outlay, Fire TV will increase your viewing options a hundredfold.  Fire TV has to be the best value of all time.  This is a true revolution.
